languages.text: {n}Мужчина улыбается вам с отчаянием приговоренного и выпаливает:{/n} "Мне не о чем говорить с тобой, ерети{mf|к|чка}!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина улыбается вам с отчаянием приговоренного и выпаливает:{/n} "Мне не о чем говорить с тобой, ерети{mf|к|чка}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, lordly heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, lordly heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, lordly heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, lordly heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, lordly heretic!"
{n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

languages.text: {n}El prisionero esboza la sonrisa de un hombre condenado y grita:{/n} «¡No tengo nada que decirte, hereje!».
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El prisionero esboza la sonrisa de un hombre condenado y grita:{/n} «¡No tengo nada que decirte, Lord Hereje!».

languages.text: {n}囚人は死刑囚のような笑みを浮かべ、食ってかかる。{/n}「何も言うことはない、異端め！」
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人は死刑囚のような笑みを浮かべ、食ってかかる。{/n}「何も言うことはない、この異端の君主め！」

languages.text: {n}犯人对你露出了微笑，仿佛已经接受了自己必死的命运，随后厉声喝道。{/n}“我对你无话可说，异端分子！”
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}犯人对你露出了微笑，仿佛已经接受了自己必死的命运，随后厉声喝道。{/n}“异端分子的头领，我对你无话可说！”

languages.text: {n}Der Gefangene lächelt das Lächeln eines Verdammten und kläfft:{/n} "Ich habe Euch nichts zu sagen, {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gefangene lächelt das Lächeln eines Verdammten und kläfft:{/n} "Ich habe Euch nichts zu sagen, Euer {mf|Ketzer|Ketzerinnen}schaft!"

languages.text: {n}Avec le sourire d'un homme qui se sait condamné, l'homme rétorque vertement :{/n} « Je n'ai rien à vous dire, hérétique ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec le sourire d'un homme qui se sait condamné, l'homme rétorque vertement :{/n} « Je n'ai rien à vous dire, {mf|nanti|nantie} hérétique ! »

languages.text: {n}Mahkûm, sana ölümü bekleyen birine yaraşır bir gülümsemeyle bakarak bir anda patlıyor.{/n} "Sana söyleyecek hiçbir şeyim yok kâfir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner gives you the smile of a man condemned and snaps,{/n} "I've got nothing to say to you, heretic!"
